draw_arrow

PURPOSE

draw filled circles at centers x with radii r.

SYNOPSIS

function h = draw_arrow(x, r, orientation,outline_color)

DESCRIPTION 

 draw filled circles at centers x with radii r.
 x is a matrix of columns.  r is a row vector.

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function is called by:
  • show_ellipses_on_image

0002 % draw filled circles at centers x with radii r.
0003 % x is a matrix of columns.  r is a row vector.
0004 
0005 n = 3;                    % resolution
0006 coords_x = [0:r/5:r];
0007 coord_x = x(1) + cos(orientation)*(coords_x);
0008 coord_y = x(2) + sin(orientation)*(coords_x);
0009 
0010 h = [];
0011 % hold is needed for fill()
0012 held = ishold;
0013 hold on
0014 
0015 
0016 h = [h line(coord_x,coord_y, 'Color', outline_color)];
